TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EntityContainer extends System.Data.Metadata.Edm.GlobalItem

Docs.summary: Represents an entity container in a conceptual model. An EntityContainer is a logical grouping of entity sets and association sets.
Gets a list of entity sets and association sets that this includes.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReadOnlyMetadataCollection%601> object that contains a list of entity sets and association sets that this includes.

Docs.summary: Gets the built-in type kind for this .
Docs.value: A object that represents the built-in type kind for this .

Docs.summary: Specifies a collection of elements. Each function contains the details of a stored procedure that exists in the database or equivalent `CommandText` that is mapped to an entity and its properties.
